pr_title: Updates azure-sdk-bom Version in Preparation for Release

timeline.bodyText: Should this have a version tag? Makes it easy for e2e and spring modules to refer to the bom and update when this gets updated.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: I can add one, the BOM isn't version managed in the same way the other modules are, @JimSuplizio thoughts?
replies.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: The answer is no, there will be no tags in the bom file. First, the bom file was only supposed to be released periodically (every 3-6 months according to the original conversation) and second, my automation specifically disallows dependencyManagement sections which, you know, is pretty much what a bom file is.
replies.author: JimSuplizio
